PATIENT_REGISTRATIONS.TITLE: Patient Registrations
PATIENT_REGISTRATIONS.INCORRECT_DATE_LIMIT: Year of birth must be between 1900 and 2014
PATIENT_REGISTRATIONS.STATUS_NEW_TITLE: Patient is new to the hospital
PATIENT_REGISTRATIONS.STATUS_NEW_BODY: Select this option for patients that have never been registered with the hospital before. The hospital has no information about this patient and no prescription / service history.
PATIENT_REGISTRATIONS.STATUS_RETURNING_TITLE: Patient has previously been registered, but is new to the BHIMA system
PATIENT_REGISTRATIONS.STATUS_RETURNING_BODY: Select this option for patients that have been registered, and have a prescription / sale history with the hospital, but have never been registered with the BHIMA system, this patient is returning to the insitution but being registered with the new system.
PATIENT_REGISTRATIONS.STATUS_REGISTERED_TITLE: Patient has previously been registered in the BHIMA system
PATIENT_REGISTRATIONS.STATUS_REGISTERED_BODY: Select this option for patients that have been registered in the BHIMA system. This patient has an electronic medical record for this patient that will be looked up.
